傠字的基本解释

傠
fá
古同“伐”。

傠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fá］
［《集韻》房越切，入月，奉。］
同“伐1”。
讨伐。

傠字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傠； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页113第31
【集韻】房越切。與伐同。【揚子·太玄經】勇侏之傠，盜蒙決夬。【註】無道爲侏，反義爲傠。無道反義，衆惡所歸，故宜決。

傠字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傠字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fá］
["Ji Yun" the more the room is cut, into the month, bong. ]
Same as "Cut 1".
Crusade.
Xian
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傠; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 113 31
[Jiyun] The more the room is cut. Same with cutting. 【Yangtze·Tai Xuan Jing】The courage of the brave dwarf, the thief of the Mengjue. [Note] Wudao is dwarf, the opposite is Xiu. There is no antagonism, all evils belong to it, so it is appropriate to decide.
